original_text: “When you besiege a city for a long time, making war against it in order to take it, you shall not destroy its trees by wielding an axe against them. You may eat from them, but you shall not cut them down. Are the trees in the field human, that they should be besieged by you?
korean_text: 너희가 어떤 성읍을 오랫동안 에워싸고 그 성읍을 쳐서 점령하려 할 때에도 도끼를 둘러 그 곳의 나무를 찍어내지 말라 이는 너희가 먹을 것이 될 것임이니 찍지 말라 들의 수목이 사람이냐 너희가 어찌 그것을 에워싸겠느냐

sentences.original_text: When you besiege a city for a long time
you shall not destroy its trees
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 나무들을 파괴해서는 안 되니

sentences.original_text: by wielding an axe against them
but you shall not cut them down
Are the trees in the field human
that they should be besieged by you
